nodes.text: Vault 806 was the Galactic Republic designation for one of the Rakata vaults in the Caves of the Primeval Wardens, a section of the Tomb on the planet Belsavis. During the invasion of Belsavis, the crime lord Ivory attempted to escape Belsavis using a Rakata ship stored in the vault, but was pursued by a smuggler and the Abyssin assassin Dust. After the smuggler and Ivory killed Dust, Ivory agreed to work with the smuggler to take down his former protege Rogun Matt'rik.
Vault 806 appears in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as the location of the Smuggler class mission "Twenty to Life" on Belsavis.
